title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 5 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 5 2022
description:
Fifteen percent of Americans, 46 million, have relocated because of covid. Big blue states, New York, Illinois, and California lose the most population. Wall Street Journal: Red states are winning the post-pandemic economy. Workers and employers moved away from the coasts to middle of country and Florida, sparking swifter recoveries there. California Governor Newsom (who has Florida envy) runs "Freedom is under attack by Republican" ads in Florida. Buck is still fired up about trending because of his mask comments about Ashville, North Carolina. Clay takes ESPN, writer to task over woke, anti-American July 4 column: "How does this piece serve sports fans?"

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
